segment.source: GoldWave #
segment.target: GoldWave #

segment.source: Authors: Joseph Lee, NVDA contributors.
segment.target: Authors: Joseph Lee, NVDA contributors.

segment.source: Note: I (Joseph Lee) am looking for people who will maintain GoldWave add-on from April 1, 2022 onwards.
segment.target: Note: I (Joseph Lee) am looking for people who will maintain GoldWave add-on from April 1, 2022 onwards.

segment.source: This app module enhances access and usage of GoldWave audio editor.
segment.target: This app module enhances access and usage of GoldWave audio editor.

segment.source: Shortcuts ##
segment.target: Shortcuts ##

segment.source: All commands support speech on demand mode.
segment.target: All commands support speech on demand mode.

segment.source: Control+Shift+P: Announces current track position.
segment.target: Control+Shift+P: Announces current track position.

segment.source: NVDA+Shift+R: Announces remaining time for the currently editing track.
segment.target: NVDA+Shift+R: Announces remaining time for the currently editing track.

segment.source: Control+NVDA+1: Announces the channel you are editing.
segment.target: Control+NVDA+1: Announces the channel you are editing.

segment.source: Control+NVDA+2: Announces the total length of the audio file.
segment.target: Control+NVDA+2: Announces the total length of the audio file.

segment.source: Control+NVDA+3: announces a summary on audio selection information.
segment.target: Control+NVDA+3: announces a summary on audio selection information.

segment.source: Control+NVDA+4: Announces the zoom level.
segment.target: Control+NVDA+4: Announces the zoom level.

segment.source: For more information about GoldWave and keyboard commands, refer to GoldWave Manual.
segment.target: For more information about GoldWave and keyboard commands, refer to GoldWave Manual.

segment.source: Note: GoldWave 6 or later and Windows 10 or later is required.
segment.target: Note: GoldWave 6 or later and Windows 10 or later is required.

segment.source: Version 25.07
segment.target: Version 25.07

segment.source: Made the add-on code more robust with help from Pyright (a Python static type checker).
segment.target: Made the add-on code more robust with help from Pyright (a Python static type checker).

segment.source: Improved audio selection, zoom level, and track position announcements in GoldWave 7.
segment.target: Improved audio selection, zoom level, and track position announcements in GoldWave 7.

segment.source: Version 25.04
segment.target: Version 25.04

segment.source: Removed command announcement mode, replaced with speech on demand mode. In speech on demand mode, GoldWave specific commands such as setting start marker will stay silent while informational commands such as audio position will be spoken.
segment.target: Removed command announcement mode, replaced with speech on demand mode. In speech on demand mode, GoldWave specific commands such as setting start marker will stay silent while informational commands such as audio position will be spoken.

segment.source: Version 25.02
segment.target: Version 25.02

segment.source: NVDA 2024.1 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2024.1 or later is required.

segment.source: Restored limited support for Windows 8.1.
segment.target: Restored limited support for Windows 8.1.

segment.source: Version 25.01
segment.target: Version 25.01

segment.source: Support for GoldWave 7 (requires 64-bit Windows 10 or later).
segment.target: Support for GoldWave 7 (requires 64-bit Windows 10 or later).

segment.source: Download links for add-on releases are no longer included in add-on documentation. You can download the add-on from NV Access add-on store.
segment.target: Download links for add-on releases are no longer included in add-on documentation. You can download the add-on from NV Access add-on store.

segment.source: Switched linting tool from Flake8 to Ruff and reformatted add-on modules to better align with NVDA coding standards.
segment.target: Switched linting tool from Flake8 to Ruff and reformatted add-on modules to better align with NVDA coding standards.

segment.source: Removed support for automatic add-on updates feature from Add-on Updater add-on.
segment.target: Removed support for automatic add-on updates feature from Add-on Updater add-on.

segment.source: Version 23.02
segment.target: Version 23.02

segment.source: NVDA 2022.4 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2022.4 or later is required.

segment.source: Windows 10 21H2 (November 2021 Update/build 19044) or later is required.
segment.target: Windows 10 21H2 (November 2021 Update/build 19044) or later is required.

segment.source: Version 23.01
segment.target: Version 23.01

segment.source: NVDA 2022.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2022.3 or later is required.

segment.source: Windows 10 or later is required as Windows 7, 8, and 8.1 are no longer supported by Microsoft as of January 2023.
segment.target: Windows 10 or later is required as Windows 7, 8, and 8.1 are no longer supported by Microsoft as of January 2023.

segment.source: Version 22.03
segment.target: Version 22.03

segment.source: NVDA 2021.3 or later is required.
segment.target: NVDA 2021.3 or later is required.

segment.source: A warning message will be displayed when attempting to install the add-on on Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.
segment.target: A warning message will be displayed when attempting to install the add-on on Windows 7, 8, and 8.1.

segment.source: Version 21.10
segment.target: Version 21.10

segment.source: NVDA 2021.2 or later is required due to changes to NVDA that affects this add-on.
segment.target: NVDA 2021.2 or later is required due to changes to NVDA that affects this add-on.

segment.source: In GoldWave 6.57 and later, NVDA will no longer repeat the name of the loaded file when pressing play/rewind/stop keys.
segment.target: In GoldWave 6.57 and later, NVDA will no longer repeat the name of the loaded file when pressing play/rewind/stop keys.

segment.source: Version 21.06
segment.target: Version 21.06

segment.source: Resolved additional coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.
segment.target: Resolved additional coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.

segment.source: Version 20.06
segment.target: Version 20.06

segment.source: Resolved many coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.
segment.target: Resolved many coding style issues and potential bugs with Flake8.

segment.source: Version 20.04
segment.target: Version 20.04

segment.source: Added input help messages for remainig time command (NVDA+Shift+R).
segment.target: Added input help messages for remainig time command (NVDA+Shift+R).

segment.source: Toggle command announcement command (NVDA+Shift+C) will now show up under "GoldWave" category in NVDA's input gestures dialog.
segment.target: Toggle command announcement command (NVDA+Shift+C) will now show up under "GoldWave" category in NVDA's input gestures dialog.

segment.source: Version 20.01
segment.target: Version 20.01

segment.source: Requires NVDA 2019.3 or later.
segment.target: Requires NVDA 2019.3 or later.

segment.source: Version 19.11
segment.target: Version 19.11

segment.source: Windows 7 SP1, GoldWave 6.x, and NVDA 2019.1 or later is required.
segment.target: Windows 7 SP1, GoldWave 6.x, and NVDA 2019.1 or later is required.

segment.source: Added help message for sound window (accessible if Control Usage Assistant add-on is installed).
segment.target: Added help message for sound window (accessible if Control Usage Assistant add-on is installed).

segment.source: Version 18.12
segment.target: Version 18.12

segment.source: NVDA will no longer appear to do nothing or play error tones when performing certain GoldWave commands with command announcement set to off (this may result in odd behaviors in some cases).
segment.target: NVDA will no longer appear to do nothing or play error tones when performing certain GoldWave commands with command announcement set to off (this may result in odd behaviors in some cases).

segment.source: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.
segment.target: Internal changes to support future NVDA releases.

segment.source: Version 18.07
segment.target: Version 18.07

segment.source: Fixed an issue where leading zeroes would not be displayed when trying to obtain remaining time for a trakc.
segment.target: Fixed an issue where leading zeroes would not be displayed when trying to obtain remaining time for a trakc.

segment.source: Version 17.05
segment.target: Version 17.05

segment.source: Added ability to provide debug information when NVDA is running with debug logging enabled (NVDA 2017.1 or later).
segment.target: Added ability to provide debug information when NVDA is running with debug logging enabled (NVDA 2017.1 or later).

segment.source: Updated translations.
segment.target: Updated translations.

segment.source: Version 16.12
segment.target: Version 16.12

segment.source: Version scheme is now year.month instead of major.minor.
segment.target: Version scheme is now year.month instead of major.minor.

segment.source: Changes for 4.0
segment.target: Changes for 4.0

segment.source: Add-on repository has moved to GitHub (now located at https://github.com/josephsl/goldwave).
segment.target: Add-on repository has moved to GitHub (now located at https://github.com/josephsl/goldwave).

segment.source: Performance improvements when looking up information such as channel name and other status information.
segment.target: Performance improvements when looking up information such as channel name and other status information.

segment.source: Changes for 3.0
segment.target: Changes for 3.0

segment.source: Added a command to announce remaining time for the current track (NVDA+Shift+R).
segment.target: Added a command to announce remaining time for the current track (NVDA+Shift+R).

segment.source: Slight improvements when announcing status information such as channel information.
segment.target: Slight improvements when announcing status information such as channel information.

segment.source: Changes for 2.0
segment.target: Changes for 2.0

segment.source: Support for GoldWave 6, including 64-bit version of GoldWave (see note above).
segment.target: Support for GoldWave 6, including 64-bit version of GoldWave (see note above).

segment.source: Add-on help can now be accessed from add-ons manager (NVDA 2014.3 and later).
segment.target: Add-on help can now be accessed from add-ons manager (NVDA 2014.3 and later).

segment.source: NVDA now announces selected channel if you press channel selection commands such as Control+Shift+L for the left channel.
segment.target: NVDA now announces selected channel if you press channel selection commands such as Control+Shift+L for the left channel.

segment.source: Various issues with numeric edit fields such as censor field and time selector in mix dialog has been fixed, including selecting text, updating values and so on.
segment.target: Various issues with numeric edit fields such as censor field and time selector in mix dialog has been fixed, including selecting text, updating values and so on.

segment.source: Command announcement setting will be remembered when switching to other programs.
segment.target: Command announcement setting will be remembered when switching to other programs.

segment.source: Changes for 1.2
segment.target: Changes for 1.2

segment.source: Fixed an issue where NVDA had difficulty announcing some edit fields.
segment.target: Fixed an issue where NVDA had difficulty announcing some edit fields.

segment.source: New and updated translations.
segment.target: New and updated translations.

segment.source: Please note that due to recent changes in NVDA, audio selection and other status commands may not work as expected in some systems.
segment.target: Please note that due to recent changes in NVDA, audio selection and other status commands may not work as expected in some systems.

segment.source: Changes for 1.1
segment.target: Changes for 1.1

segment.source: Support for message announcements in braille.
segment.target: Support for message announcements in braille.

segment.source: Audio selection summary is presented in languages other than English.
segment.target: Audio selection summary is presented in languages other than English.

segment.source: More command announcements added including cue position movement and delete/trim operations.
segment.target: More command announcements added including cue position movement and delete/trim operations.

segment.source: Fixed an issue in numeric edit fields such as various effects dialogs where nothing or wrong field name was announced.
segment.target: Fixed an issue in numeric edit fields such as various effects dialogs where nothing or wrong field name was announced.

segment.source: New and updated translations.
segment.target: New and updated translations.

segment.source: Changes for 1.0
segment.target: Changes for 1.0

segment.source: Initial version.
segment.target: Initial version.

segment.source: [1]: https://addons.nvda-project.org/files/get.php?file=goldwave
segment.target: [1]: https://addons.nvda-project.org/files/get.php?file=goldwave
